description: Calculates the orbital period of a satellite around a central body given the semi-major axis of its orbit and the mass of the central body.
code:
def compute_period_of_satellite(semi_major_axis, central_body_mass):
    import math
    G = 6.67430e-11 # Gravitational constant in m^3 kg^-1 s^-2
    period = 2 * math.pi * math.sqrt(semi_major_axis**3 / (G * central_body_mass))
    return period
